website_summaries.verdict: Stylish and sleek construction, affordable price, and results that satisfy more than they disappoint make this model worth considering despite some quirks.
pros: Can begin heating lather quickly – in as little as two minutes
Compatible with traditional and gel-consistency shaving products
Price falls on the low end of the scale, making it suitable for budget-conscious consumers
cons: Mixed opinions on its performance – some owners say it produces hot lather while others wish it were warmer
Won't accommodate all types of cans

customer_reviews.title: clogs up and it cannot be unclogged
customer_reviews.text: I have had this product for nearly two years. My previous one lasted about 14 years (give or take) until the plastic ring holding the can finally broke. This one was working great and now will not allow any flow of shaving cream. I have tried different things and I am sure that it is blocked/clogged but there are absolutely no instructions to clean it out and Conair does not even acknowledge anywhere on their web site that they have this product so in essence there is no customer support. It is really a binary purchase. If it works, it works great, otherwise it does not work at all.
customer_reviews.author: letti001

customer_reviews.title: Faulty
customer_reviews.text: This product is defective. This product used an entire bottle of gel in one use. The directions are faulty. This product does not do what it states in the directions.
customer_reviews.author: Julia & John

customer_reviews.title: Conair's Lukewarm Lather and Gel Machine
customer_reviews.text: This product does not really work that well. The Lather only machines that Conair used to manufactured in the past were a far superior product. The combined Lather and Gel machines carry both the hot lather and hot gel functions poorly. The machine should be called the luke warm lather and gel machine.
customer_reviews.author: Charles E. O'connor Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Worste Conair Product Ever Don't Waste Your Money
customer_reviews.text: This is the 2nd one withine a two week time period and it also only worked one time and then stopped. It is by far the worste product I've ever used that was made by Conair which is known for pretty decent products. Not this one, they toally missed the mark a complete disappointment I DO NOT RECOMMEND THIS PRODUCT TO ANTONE, NOT EVEN AN ENEMY .
customer_reviews.author: Zachary Smith

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: Works great! My previous one worked well for over ten years, but recently failed. I was so happy to find it available here AND to get it so quickly. I missed the very-warm gel lather and the ease of one-handed operation. Has a one-hour timer built-in so i turn it on, have some coffee, then shower/shave and its ready to go! Highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: LasVegasTony

customer_reviews.title: Piece of junk!
customer_reviews.text: Do not waste your money on this piece of junk! I used it for about one month, then one day it just stopped working. The light was lit to say that the lather was heated and ready, but when I pushed the dispense button no lather came out. I change the can of gel thinking maybe it was empty, but still nothing came out. Great while it lasted, but it sure didn’t last long.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This thing is a piece of junk!
customer_reviews.text: Revising my previous review. This thing quit working after about 6 months of use. Do NOT buy or you too will waste your money. I had bought one of these previously from Sharper Image and it lasted much longer than 6 months. Very disappointed in this product.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Schmitz

customer_reviews.title: Very good shaving cream warmer
customer_reviews.text: If you expect hot lather as in a hot towel then forget it but that's not what this is for anyway. Nice warm shaving cream is what this will give you. Don't put on the base because you must shake the canister of shaving cream before use. Most people don't know how to use it so ignore the negative reviews. When you use you must wait for the light to stop blinking, that shows it's warmed up. After you use it it will cool down so just wait again and it will warm back up.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher R.

customer_reviews.title: I really like this shaving creame heater
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little heater for you lather or gel. It is very simple and gets the lather very warm if you turn it up. I did notice you must make sure you turn the temp selector in the correct position to really heat up the lather.
customer_reviews.author: Skippy

customer_reviews.title: A little barbershop pampering right at home
customer_reviews.text: Great little product but you gotta be quick when you use it. After setting it up and using it again and again I just wasn’t feeling the real barbershop heat soo...I experimented with the time continuum lol just kidding but if you get everything ready and then push the “on” button ...monitor the blinking light and upon it stopping, dispense immmediately or it just cools off. And I use the foam not the gel maybe gel lasts longer but I also recommend you apply to your most stubborn and roughed out area and be ready to attack do not walk around cuz it will cool down
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Terrible product; bought three and none of them worked right
customer_reviews.text: My husband has always used a Conair foamer for heating his shaving cream. For the past 30 plus years. The last three I have purchased, all Conair models, have stopped working within a month. They don't heat properly and just stop working altogether. Not sure what the company has done to change the design, but it might have something to do with the fact that gel or foaming cream can be used. It should just be one or the other. Why mess with a good design? I won't buy another one ever again. So disappointed! If I could have left a negative star rating, I would have.
customer_reviews.author: Clemmiejo

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't heat. Purchased to heat shaving lather, but wouldn't heat.
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't heat. Purchased to heat shaving lather, but wouldn't heat. There were negative ratings, I assumed because it clogged when used with shaving gel. I planned to use with lather only so figured it would be OK. It never clogged, but it also never heated the later which is the primary function. I don't normally do reviews, but this product just didn't work new out of the box. I cannot recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: mdb443

customer_reviews.title: FOR THE MAN WHO HAS EVERYTHING!
customer_reviews.text: WE'RE MARRIED 50 YEARS AND MY HUSBAND HAS ONLY HAD TWO OF THESE. . . THAT'S HOW LONG THEY LAST! WHEN WE WENT LOOKING FOR A REPLACEMENT RECENTLY, NO ONE KNEW WHAT WE WERE TALKING ABOUT. IF THEY DID, THEY DIDN'T HAVE IT ANYWAY! ARRIVED IN ONLY ONE DAY! FOR THE MAN WHO HAS EVERYTHING AND SHAVES WITH A NON ELECTRIC RAZOR, HE'LL LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: Take this back. Impossible to get the gel shaving cream loaded into the dispenser.
customer_reviews.author: Southernone

customer_reviews.title: Bought a Used Like New Product.  It wasn't Like New at all!
customer_reviews.text: I found that whoever had this before me had used shaving gel leaving residue inside the heater cap. It was not mentioned anywhere that the item had been used and not cleaned before resale to me. Overall, the box it came in seemed undamaged with all the parts and papers inside. The only complaint is that the heater cap part of the unit isn't clean from where someone else used it before me.
customer_reviews.author: Teamjj

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: It takes a couple minutes to heat up. Turn it on before heading to shower and it will be ready to use after the shower. Make sure to clean the cap everyday or it will get plugged. To clean the cap, after rinsing it, I put it in the bottom of a cup of water facing downwards. The water does the cleaning itself.
customer_reviews.author: Umutcan

customer_reviews.title: Damaged!
customer_reviews.text: The box came in damaged and the head of nozzle is scratched. Looks used, please resend a new product!
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: Great warmer for shaving cream.
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this for 1.5 months with no issues. It would be a warmer and does not make the shaving cream hot. I use it with Gel and have no issues. It does come out warm and feels good on the face. It also comes out not as a gel, but as a nice frothy shaving cream so you do not need to try to froth up the gel in your hand. That alone is great. I would recommend, but make sure you use the correct setup for gel or not. Also make sure that it is all tight together before you connect your can and try it.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Gutmann

customer_reviews.title: I used the gel nozzle, the gel leaks out ...
customer_reviews.text: I used the gel nozzle, the gel leaks out of the top, side and bottom of the nozzle connection. I have contacted Conair, they want me to pay to send it back and include a $3.00 check so they can ship a new one to me. I asked for a refund because I don't believe anything is going to change with a new. There is a lot of stress being put on the connector of the nozzle to the body, and having to press the button to dispense the cream does"t help because its all plastic.
customer_reviews.author: penname45

customer_reviews.title: This product is so terrible, I thought about growing my pre-adolescent boy beard back
customer_reviews.text: I have only used this product one time. When you installed the shave gel into the dispenser it is very difficult, if not impossible to do so without wasting the gel. The gel is supposed to be warm when it is dispensed, but it is not. I am very disappointed in this product and the fact that Conair let this be sold to consumers.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Catura

customer_reviews.title: OK, but needs improvements.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble, poor locking system and top heavy. When you go to dispense gel or lather, there is to weight or suction to hold system upright. Lather is warm but could be warmer. Canister locking system really poor and comes unlocked any time you touch it. Not bad for money but could be great with mentioned sugessted improvements.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Collins

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Works well but not for very long so when new works great but after about six months it doesn’t work at all, I have owned five of them they are junk I will not own another.
customer_reviews.author: Richard S.

customer_reviews.title: Well priced but can only be used with canned shaving cream
customer_reviews.text: In order to use this product you have to buy shaving cream that already comes in a can. If you make your own lather cream or buy cream from a company like “The Art of Shaving”, you won’t be able to use this. I returned mine once I realized.
customer_reviews.author: My opinion

customer_reviews.title: Did not get very hot
customer_reviews.text: He picked it out but he said it did not get hot like he thought it would. The shipping was great along with the packaging . I gave it 4 because he was not impressed with it. He used the gel kind in it also.
customer_reviews.author: Cassie

customer_reviews.title: Clearly many have no idea how to use this item...
customer_reviews.text: I have had ZERO issues with this machine. No clogging, no emptying of full cans of shaving cream and no issues with the CLEAR instructions that even have pictures. I'm willing to guess these are operator error in 99% of the cases. That said, while I have had no issues, the unit just does not heat the shaving cream up enough. The lather is noticeably warm, but it's not the quality hot lather I was hoping for. If you want an affordable warm lather shave, this is your machine, if you want a hot lather, I'd look else where.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Not hot
customer_reviews.text: Works fine, but definitely not a hot lather. I've tried leaving it on for 15-20 minutes before I use it and it still comes out just warm. By the time you get it to your face you can barely tell it's been heated. Plus because the shaving cream can is in the machine you can't shake it like you normally would, so the shaving cream has less body when it comes out. Overall, probably not worth the counter space.
customer_reviews.author: donie

customer_reviews.title: 5 Stars!
customer_reviews.text: Have to give item 5 stars since item works as described and I have been using for a while now. It does work best with foam vs. gel at least for me it does. Well worth the money and I don't have to shave with cold foam.
customer_reviews.author: Max C.

customer_reviews.title: waste of money
customer_reviews.text: bought the same product from Bridgestone in Dec. enjoyed the heated lather until the unit failed to work in April. Ordered the Conair system from Amazon and looked forward to its arrival, only to find that it failed to work straight out of the box! I even tried more than one can of lather and, as instructed, reset the can several times. I would not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: SCOTT J PATERSON

customer_reviews.title: Husband approved!
customer_reviews.text: My husband used this product for years and it still works just as good as the day we got it out of the box. Warms the shaving cream and is great for the perfect shave. Great gift for the hard to buy for men in your life! It was a great value considering it has lasted for years.
customer_reviews.author: Taija

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 5 months
customer_reviews.text: This was great in the beginning, made the shaving cream nice and warm. It’s been 5 months and already stopped working. I should have listened to the other reviews and saved my money.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Donohue

customer_reviews.title: I'm done.
customer_reviews.text: I've had 3 or 4 of these the past 12 or more years. The first on lasted over 7 years but last one barely 2 1/2. I received this one and it would not dispense the lather (Usual malfunction after use). I reorder a replacement and experienced the same problem and returned both for a refund. Conair's Quality Assurance appears to have diminished and I will not purchase from Conair.
customer_reviews.author: Virgostopcat

customer_reviews.title: Second one works great! First one we got, did Not.
customer_reviews.text: First order would turn on but not dispense, even when tried with 3 different types of shave cream can. Returned, and This one works fine as described. Nice and warm, per husband.
customer_reviews.author: NM hiker

customer_reviews.title: It's Crap - Do Not Buy
customer_reviews.text: Piece of crap. Got it at the end of July, and it no longer worked by the end of August. We had a previous model that worked for over 14 years. This one didn't work after a month!
customer_reviews.author: Eje

customer_reviews.title: Better Instructions
customer_reviews.text: I tried for the better part of 3 hours to figure out how the heck to understand the instructions to make the dang thing work.....I give up sending it back to Amazon.....I can usually figure out how something works....
customer_reviews.author: Billy of Ft Worth TX

customer_reviews.title: My husband loves it
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves this. He has been saying he wanted one for a while, and I finally convinced him to order one. He loves the temperature it makes his shaving cream and says it “opens his pores”... something he has never said, and had a smidge or sarcasm behind it because he loves it so much.
customer_reviews.author: M3G

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to use for not much payoff
customer_reviews.text: So it looks nice but doesn't really get very warm. I use barbasol foam and it takes an incredible amount of pressure to get the dispenser to start pushing foam out. Honestly not really with the effort.
customer_reviews.author: mark m.

customer_reviews.title: Good product and universal
customer_reviews.text: Good product and universal. Foam was only getting slightly warm for the first could of weeks but i have now had it for a couple of months and sometimes the first bit of foam that comes out is almost too hot for my hand to handle. I believe this product is going to last a long time but if it breaks, I may look into another one. Still this was a great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher B.

customer_reviews.title: Works Right out of the Box
customer_reviews.text: Most appliances are common sense and we ignore the directions. Read the instructions for this lather dispenser as several steps aren't usually done with consumer appliances. Works well and recommended to start in cooler gel setting first and adjust it hotter for best hot lather results.
customer_reviews.author: Marone Khmer

customer_reviews.title: Trash
customer_reviews.text: Horrible product. The gel/lather selection switch broke on the first one. Second one would not work with gel and was like warm at best with lather.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: OVER ENGINEERED
customer_reviews.text: It seems the Conair 1NR/HGL 1R has a design flaw ! I belive this unit was designed around one lot of shave cream cans . Im noticing the somewhat 50 / 50 returns . I had to do some redesigning by drilling the raised area at the inlet hole until the hump was gone with a 1/2" drill " NOW IT WORKS PERFECT " So if you know alittle about engineering this is the unit for you !! If you don't stay away !
customer_reviews.author: John Miller

customer_reviews.title: No happy
customer_reviews.text: Brought for my husband and I regret it I thought I did an amazing job fixing his station and when i walk back the gel was all over his station I'm so upset
customer_reviews.author: Melanie aquino

customer_reviews.title: Broke within a week!
customer_reviews.text: When we first used with shave lather system it was great! But ... within a week it broke. This was our second try purchasing this item. Do not recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Deb B.

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased and returned this item because it was defective, and the replacement didn't work either! It doesn't dispense properly. My husband had used a similar lather heating system in the past, so user error doesn't seem to be the problem.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Fleming

customer_reviews.title: Had it for 6 months and works
customer_reviews.text: Just a simple, affordable and great product that does what it promises. Have had it for over six months now and had no issue. If you want a warm lather, I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Shine

customer_reviews.title: Not the greatest...
customer_reviews.text: Not great. Only luke-warm lather that cools to room temperature by the time it gets from the dispenser to your face. It's back to the brush and mug for me. Anyone want a slightly used one for cheap???
customer_reviews.author: TheJeepFamily

customer_reviews.title: Warm jell is great
customer_reviews.text: I was worried that my favorite gel might not work. The tall can of Harry's shaving gel fits and works fine. The days of putting nice hot water on my face, followed by the shock of ice cold gel, are gone. I might even start looking forward to shaving.
customer_reviews.author: Richard S. Hoadley

customer_reviews.title: Complete Junk & waste of money
customer_reviews.text: One star was as low as it would let me go. Don’t waste your money on this, complete junk. Bought one, it didn’t work, they shipped a new one, and it didn’t work either.
customer_reviews.author: Marc Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Messy and not worth the investment
customer_reviews.text: Horrible. I wouldn't recommend this at all. The "heat" was just marginal...I was expecting something comparable to what I would get at the barber shop. I tried gel and it was a big mess. Might have had better success with regular shaving cream but I tend to use more lotion based shaving products and really didn't want to make any more mess in the bathroom. Save your money and buy yourself something more enjoyable.
customer_reviews.author: J. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Mine works extremely well
customer_reviews.text: I always wanted one of these, so I grabbed one despite the numerous negative reviews. Maybe I got lucky and received one of the few good ones, but mine works great. Only had it for a couple of months, so maybe longevity will be an issue. But overall, I’m very pleased for the price I paid.
customer_reviews.author: Jared Clayton Baxter

customer_reviews.title: It quit working
customer_reviews.text: It worked really well for 3 weeks then the gel will not come out!! I put a new can in it & it will not work at all now!! I don’t have the box it came in so I can’t send it back!! I think it should last longer than 3 weeks!!! I’m thinking about buying a better one!!! I love the heated gel on my face!!! Please let me hear from you! My email is doyleeadams@gmail.com! Thank you!!
customer_reviews.author: Doyle E. Adams

customer_reviews.title: Hard to Understand Setup!
customer_reviews.text: The instructions were complicated! I just got frustrated and gave it to a friend! He can't decipher it so he put it aside... There should be a step by step video on youtube!
customer_reviews.author: rostan

customer_reviews.title: Worked GREAT with cheaper shave creams
customer_reviews.text: Bought Clubman shave cream with it and the shave cream can kept dispensing cream nonstop. Cheaper shave cream had before (wanted to use up before opening the Clubman) worked great! Once I finish this can, will go beck to my $1.50 brand.
customer_reviews.author: Richard S Kobre

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I had to return this item because it didn't work. I have been trying to replace a Connair shaving cream heater that my husband had for close to 20 years. We even tried to replicate the one we had which was purchased for $29.99 now selling for $169. It looked exactly the same, except it didn't work either. So one star is the lowest I can give but would like to give less.
customer_reviews.author: Faith818

customer_reviews.title: Awesome little machine
customer_reviews.text: My husband has never liked gadgets or extra little things but I bought him this and he absolutely loves it. He turns it on to warm up while he’s preparing his shower. The warm shave is a much closer shave he says. It’s very simple to operate but gives just a little extra touch to start or end your day.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It does what it's supposed to do and it's a great replacement for the old
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves this product. It does what it's supposed to do and it's a great replacement for the old, bigger, version. Wish the material was a little more durable but it has survived travel and regular use at home.
customer_reviews.author: SSmith1

customer_reviews.title: Terrible product DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY. It is a piece of crap. Very poorly designed. It leaks the gel out of the product and makes a mess. It does not really heat up the gel. Returned the product after 2 weeks. I had a ConAir gel heating system in the past and worked great. Needed new one because the old one clogged up and couldn't clean. Biggest mistake was buying this one. Will look for something else but it won't be ConAir
customer_reviews.author: Marty O

customer_reviews.title: Bad product
customer_reviews.text: Relaced by amazon.. without problem but this model is just not worthwhile. Barely heats compared to same unit in the past.
customer_reviews.author: Old Dog

customer_reviews.title: Heats well, but mine was defective
customer_reviews.text: Wouldn’t stay on gel type very well. Works nice if stays on. Had to return it as it released gel inside itself and all over sink after one week.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Ehrnst

customer_reviews.title: Buy a better one
customer_reviews.text: After the first can of foam I hooked up a can of gel using the adapter provided. Nothing...literally. nothing came out at all. After a second can of foam It no longer heats at all as far as I can tell. A fine example of greedy people turning our irreplaceable natural resources into dysfunctional junk to make a buck. Don't waste your money on this product. Buy a better one.
customer_reviews.author: John Getreu

customer_reviews.title: Ok but fell short of my expectations
customer_reviews.text: Don’t get very hot barely stays warm from the time you put it on your face, didn’t experience much of a deference, try it for shaveing
customer_reviews.author: LEE

customer_reviews.title: Quite disappointed - barely warms shaving cream
customer_reviews.text: This item is poorly made. The material is not high quality and it barely warms the shaving cream.
customer_reviews.author: CLINT E WATSON

customer_reviews.title: It works very well
customer_reviews.text: It does take reading the directions and a little fine-tuning when changing the shaving cream out (be careful that it doesn't drip everywhere when you do change it out). But it works very well, very warm shaving cream. Serves its purpose, and a decent price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: After 45 days, just stopped heating
customer_reviews.text: When it worked, it worked well. Clean dispensation of shaving cream. Nice, solid engagement to the top of the can. Well around day 45, the heat lights come on flashing, gets solid when the apparent timer says it is hot, but there is no heating at all of the shaving cream. Three days in row of this and I adjusted the temperature control up and down to confirm. Yup. It has failed.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Anoia

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Oddly enough I love this product. Heats cream or jell. Inexpensive. Works. The instructions were small and i'm blind but there are few moving part so it wasn't all that difficult to figure out. I've read the negatives and I use a barber that uses a professional shaving machine and this heats just as well. Cream does thin out some but still shaves close and warm. What do you want for 20 bucks.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These things are great. I need to order a new one about ...
customer_reviews.text: These things are great. I need to order a new one about every 10 years, they stop flowing- get plugged up. BUT at this price I don't mind. Be sure to read the instructions thoroughly if using gel- it's important for it to work well.
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: Broke within 1.5 months.
customer_reviews.text: We were very excited about the warm lather for shaving. Unfortunately, it did not last very long. It started leaking out of the seams irregularly after 3 weeks. Will find another brand that works.
customer_reviews.author: bonnie taylor-talbot

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: I had always wanted a shaving cream warmer. I had trouble with it from the beginning. I finally gave up on it and returned it for a refund. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Do Good

customer_reviews.title: This product is designed to last approximately 6-8 months
customer_reviews.text: This is the 3rd ConAir lather heating dispenser I've had in 2 years. You think I would learn my lesson the last time when it stop dispensing lather after 8 months. Now this one lasted 6 months. That's not all. I sent it back for a replacement about two weeks ago and received a new one and even that one doesn't dispense later either. They are all defective now. You can get more life from a coffee filter. This is total garbage ! I'm done ! I'm going for the Wahl dispenser for $112.
customer_reviews.author: AT

customer_reviews.title: This thing doesn't work!
customer_reviews.text: I've owned one of these for 10 years, and it sort of worked. As time went on, I had to press the top harder and harder to get the shaving cream to come out. Finally, I couldn't get any out, even with a new shaving cream can inserted. So I bought a new one. Guess what? I can't get anything to come out of it no matter how hard I press. I give up--it goes into the trash.
customer_reviews.author: Paul M. Morley

customer_reviews.title: hot lather shave at home?
customer_reviews.text: this hot lather machine works well. I would like the lather to be a little hotter. It is very refreshing to feel the warm lather on my face. This also makes shaving easier, and more satisfying. Now I am ready to face the world. I would recommend this to everyone
customer_reviews.author: ramo

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing. Not close to hot.
customer_reviews.text: Heating is inconsistent and nowhere close to barber shop hot lather. Little difference from right out of the can. I’ll probably throw it out when this can is done to save electricity and have more counter space.
customer_reviews.author: frank miles

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: It's been a few months since I bought this and I recall that it was a little tricky to assemble Follow the directions exactly as written / illustrated and be sure the parts align properly - it's easy to get that part wrong. With that said, shaving cream is heated to warm at best, even on the warmest setting. I have better results dipping shaving cream into hot water in my sink than I have with this. I cannot recommend this product. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Ben B., Columbus, OH

customer_reviews.text: It does warm the shaving cream you put in it, but its really not worth the hassle, in my eyes..
customer_reviews.author: Shane Herman

customer_reviews.title: It broke
customer_reviews.text: Similar to other reviews, worked great for a few months and then broke. You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Dana Perzynski

customer_reviews.title: Not happy
customer_reviews.text: I received this in the mail the box was taped shut and that should have been my first clue that something was wrong. When I opened it pieces we’re missing and it was used already. Definitely not happy
customer_reviews.author: Christina Renova

customer_reviews.title: Nice sorta
customer_reviews.text: I like this lather machine, not as much as I do my previous ones from Conair. It turns off every hour which can be nice for being at home. However I use it in my barber shop as a backup when my professional latherizer breaks down so I must always hit the ON button with each client, takes awhile to heat up also, not a quick recovery. Its tricky on putting can on the shave button might have lost about 1/2 a can of lather! Doesn't heat up as much as I would like either.
customer_reviews.author: jo jo

customer_reviews.title: it works but it has not changed my life
customer_reviews.text: Just purchased this...... Have used it maybe four days now. Decided to use it with some Shick gel shave cream I already had in the house, and it just doesn't seem to work so well, with regard to dispensing from this container. It does slightly heat the shave gel, but it seems to take forever to get enough shave cream to use for shaving. I am curious to find out if any other users have found a better brand more suited towards use in this dispenser.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Peters

customer_reviews.title: Faster to use a hot washcloth than this.
customer_reviews.text: I had a Conair hot lather for over 20 years and loved it. It unfortunately died recently and I searched everywhere to buy one that looked like my old one without any success. I then ordered this one. It looks nice but I could have hotter lather by blowing on it then what comes out for shaving. Very disappointed as it does not provide the shave that I use to get.
customer_reviews.author: Clem Kadiddlehopper

customer_reviews.title: Great long lasting product
customer_reviews.text: This has lasted going on about 5 years. Works as well as it did the first day. Heats up lather great.

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: My husband bought this for himself & he’s always talking about how much he likes it.
customer_reviews.author: Jeri VandenOever

customer_reviews.title: Not so hot (and requires a strong thumb!')
customer_reviews.text: This is our second one. Even at the highest setting, the lather is only a bit above room temperature at the highest setting, but the more significant problem is the difficulty in dispensing the lather from the machine. We've tried different shaving lathers, but they all require a lot of pressure, and way-too-long for an adequate amount of lather to be dispensed.

customer_reviews.title: I began using this product about a week ago and...
customer_reviews.text: though reviews seem to be somewhat mixed, I've found it to be all it was advertised to be. I actually look forward to shaving everyday. And, to date, I've found none of the negatives found in other reviews to be valid. I use it with a gel but suspect using a lather will be as rewarding.

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Gel & Lather Heating System!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this Gel & Lather Heating System on February 2, 2018. As of today (March 8, 2018), this unit has Gel/foarm coming from all openings!! I'm surprised that this unit didn't even last six months. I then learn that my product return date was March 6, 2018. I wouldn't recommend this particular unit to anyone looking for a Gel & Lather Heating System.

customer_reviews.text: Does not work. Should have read reviews before purchase. Not worth paying shipment to return and paying to have it shipped back. Very surprised Amazon would market such a poor product. Will not dispense lather and gel will not stop flowing. I thought Conair would be a safe product to purchase but not. customer_reviews.author: Charles

customer_reviews.title: Slightly Warm at best
customer_reviews.text: I constantly get ingrown hairs from shaving on my neck. I have tried many tricks that can alleviate symptoms, but nothing that really works all that well. I was hoping that the warm lather would soften the hair a lot, but the lather from my gel shaving cream is slightly warm at best. It is still much more comfortable than cold gel from the can, but for the price I wouldn't say its worth the improvement.
customer_reviews.author: George P Burdell

customer_reviews.title: Great product for a smooth shave
customer_reviews.text: My husband really loves this product! It works with just about any shaving cream and leaves his face feeling refreshed!
customer_reviews.author: Miranda Martin

customer_reviews.title: Poorly thought out design
customer_reviews.text: Ive had this in my bathroom for 3 months now. The design requires the shave cream container to be inside a cylinder. Problem is if you dont shake the can inside daily the foam stops coming out of the can. Shaki n.v g the entire unit is clumsy with the cord plugged into an outlet. I would return this unit if my return window would have not expired.
customer_reviews.author: Arnoud van Nispen

customer_reviews.title: Wish this machine worked better. My husband loves the warm lather
customer_reviews.text: Wish this machine worked better. My husband loves the warm lather, but the machine ends up malfunctioning and you end up with a shaving cream mess and waste of product. We tried two units and neither worked for long. The first one was sent back and the second one ended up in the trash. Great concept, but not worth the aggravation and mess.
customer_reviews.author: CT

customer_reviews.title: My last Conair, the same machine lasted 8 years...BUY!
customer_reviews.text: Recieved my newConair today. I have had 3 different Conair lather machines in the last 25 years. In fact I had this model for 8 years, it just quit. I opened this one up and hooked it up and turned it on. The lather heated up in a few minutes and is just as hot as my old machine I am very happy with this same machine, in fact I will order a second One to keep in the pantry as a spare.

product_meta.title: Conair Shave Gel & Lather Heating System
product_meta.description: Color:ChromeThe Conair Gel & lather heating system provides a hot, Barber shave experience in the comfort of your home. Hot lather not only gives you one of the smoothest, most comfortable shaves you’ve ever had, but also one of the best. Hot lather softens whiskers so that there's less irritation, less tugging and less pulling- giving you a smooth, close comfortable shave! This device instantly heats gel or lather and will instantly heat a can of gel or lather for a smooth, comfortable “Barber shop” shave. The variable temperature control allows you to control the temperature, preserves the consistency of gel and features a ready indicator light. Great for Ladies shaves, too! 120V plug-in operation.
feature_bullets: SHAVE GEL & LATHER HEATING SYSTEM: The Conair Gel & Lather heating system is a deluxe shaving accessory that heats your favorite shave gel or cream to provide a hot, close, smooth shave experience.

UPGRADE YOUR SHAVE: Instantly heat your favorite shaving gel or lather to enhance your shaving experience. Variable temperature control preserves gel consistency. Perfect for ladies' shaves too! Does not contain asbestos
RESPECT THE RITUAL: Don't crack under the pressure to look good. ConairMAN has beard trimmers, home barbering kits, electric shavers & more for precision cuts & trims so you can get your look right.
INNOVATIVE GROOMING TOOLS: From hair & beard clippers to trimmers, shavers, epilators & home haircut kits—Conair makes high-quality grooming tools for men & women.
CONAIR HAIR CARE: Since 1959, we have made innovative small appliances, hair styling tools, & more. Our hair care line includes high-quality hair dryers, brushes, styling tools, & hair accessories.
